task_text: [Virology][Summarization] Summarize the main virological characteristics of SARS-CoV-2 described in the WHO COVID-19 brief.

gold_end_state.answer: SARS-CoV-2 is a novel coronavirus with an RNA genome, transmitted primarily via respiratory droplets and close contact; it has demonstrated rapid human-to-human transmission, the capacity to cause asymptomatic and symptomatic infections across age groups, and to generate variants with mutations that can affect transmissibility and immune escape.
